buttonAllNone.description: Button to select all scripts or none.

buttonConfirmInstallation.description: Button to confirm installation of a script.

buttonExportData.description: Button to open the data export dialog.

buttonImportData.description: Button to choose a file for data import.

buttonInstallFromURL.description: Button to ask for URL of a user script.

buttonInstallOptions.description: Button to show options of installation confirm page.

buttonNew.description: Button to create a new script.

buttonReplace.description: Button to replace the current match.

buttonReset.description: Button to reset to default values.

buttonSave.description: Button to save modifications of a script.

buttonSaveClose.description: Button to save modifications of a script and then close the editing page.

buttonSaveCustomCSS.description: Label for button to save custom CSS.

buttonUndo.description: Button to undo removement of a script.

buttonUpdateAll.message: Kiểm tra cập nhật tất cả

buttonVacuumed.description: Message shown when data is vacuumed.

buttonVacuuming.description: Message shown when data vacuum is in progress.

confirmNotSaved.description: Confirm message shown when there are unsaved script modifications.
confirmNotSaved.message:
Thay đổi chưa được lưu!
Bấm OK để huỷ bỏ hoặc Cancel đế quay lại.

descBlacklist.description: HTML Description for the global blacklist.
descBlacklist.message: URL trong danh sách này sẽ không bị bỏ qua.

descCustomCSS.message: CSS tùy chỉnh cho trang tùy chọn và trang script đã cài đặt Nếu không hiểu rõ xin đừng sửa.

editLabelMeta.description: Metadata section in settings tab of script editor.

editLabelSettings.description: Settings section in settings tab of script editor.

editNavCode.description: Label of code tab in script editor.

editNavSettings.description: Label of settings tab in script editor.

editNavValues.description: Label of values tab in script editor.

editValueCancel.description: Button to cancel modification of a script value.

editValueSave.description: Button to save modification of a script value.

extDescription.message: Hỗ trợ chạy userscript trên trình duyệt.

filterAlphabeticalOrder.description: Label for option to sort scripts in alphabetical order.

filterExecutionOrder.description: Label for option to sort scripts in execution order.

hintInputURL.description: Hint for a prompt box to input URL of a user script.

hintUseDownloadURL.description: Shown as a place holder for @updateURL when it is not assigned

hintVacuum.message: Bỏ qua dữ liệu thừa và cố gắng tải lại nguồn dữ liệu thiếu từ bộ nhớ đệm.

installFrom.description: Label for button to install script from a userscript site.

installOptionClose.description: Option to close confirm window after installation.
installOptionClose.message: Đóng sau khi cài đặt xong

installOptionTrack.description: Option to track the loading local file before window is closed.
installOptionTrack.message: Track local file before this window is closed

labelAbout.description: Label shown on top of the about page.

labelAdvanced.description: Label for button to show advanced settings.

labelAllowUpdate.description: Option to allow checking updates for a script.

labelAuthor.description: Label of author shown in the details of a script.

labelAutoReloadCurrentTab.description: Option to reload current tab after a script is switched on or off from menu.
labelAutoReloadCurrentTab.message: Tải lại trang khi bật/tắt script từ menu

labelAutoUpdate.description: Option to allow automatically checking scripts for updates every 24 hours.
labelAutoUpdate.message: Tự động kiểm tra cập nhật hàng ngày

labelBadge.description: Label for option to show number on badge.

labelBadgeNone.description: Option to display nothing on badge.

labelBadgeTotal.description: Option to display total number of running scripts on badge.

labelBadgeUnique.description: Option to display number of unique running scripts on badge.
labelBadgeUnique.message: Số script không trùng lặp đang chạy

labelBlacklist.description: Label for global blacklist settings in security section.

labelDonate.description: Label of link to donate page.

labelDownloadURL.description: Label of script @downloadURL in custom meta data.

labelEditValue.description: Label shown in the panel to edit a script value.

labelExportScriptData.description: Option to export script data along with scripts.

labelHelpTranslate.description: Label for link to localization guide in about tab

labelHomepageURL.description: Label of script @homepageURL in custom meta data.

labelImportSettings.description: Label for option to import settings from zip file.

labelIndentUnit.description: Label for editor option of indent unit size.

labelInstall.description: Shown in the title of the confirm page while trying to install a script.

labelKeepOriginal.description: Option to keep the original match or ignore rules.

labelLastUpdatedAt.description: Label shown on last updated time.

labelLineWrapping.description: Label for editor option of line wrapping.

labelNoName.description: Text as the name of a script when no @name is assigned.

labelNoScripts.description: Message shown when no script is installed.
labelNoScripts.message: Oops, bạn không có script nào được cài đặt.

labelNoSearchScripts.description: Message shown when no script is found in search results.

labelNotifyUpdates.description: Option to show notification when script is updated.
labelNotifyUpdates.message: Thông báo có cập nhật script

labelRemoved.description: Label shown when a script is removed.

labelReplace.description: Label for replace input in search box.

labelRunAt.description: Label of script @run-at properties in custom meta data.

labelRunAtDefault.description: Shown when custom @run-at is not assigned.

labelSearch.description: Label for search input in search box.

labelSettings.description: Label shown on the top of settings page

labelSyncAuthorize.description: Label for button to authorize a service.

labelSyncAuthorizing.description: Label for button when authorization is in progress.

labelSyncDisabled.description: Label for option to disable sync service.

labelSyncRevoke.description: Label for button to revoke authorization for a service.

labelSyncScriptStatus.description: Label for option to sync script status.

labelUpdateURL.description: Label of script @updateURL in custom meta data.

learnBlacklist.description: Refers to a link to introduce blacklist patterns.
learnBlacklist.message: Tìm hiểu thêm về quy tắc danh sách đen.

menuCommands.description: Menu item to list script commands.

menuDashboard.description: Label for menu item to open dashboard.

menuFindScripts.description: Menu item to find scripts for a site.

menuMatchedScripts.description: Label for menu listing matched scripts.

menuNewScript.description: Menu item to create a new script.

menuScriptDisabled.description: Menu item showing the status of Ace Script, when disabled.

menuScriptEnabled.description: Menu item showing the status of Ace Script, when enabled.

msgCheckingForUpdate.description: Message shown when a script is being checked for updates by version numbers.

msgErrorFetchingScript.description: Message shown when Ace Script fails fetching a new version of the script.
msgErrorFetchingScript.message: Có lỗi khi tìm phiên bản mới!

msgErrorFetchingUpdateInfo.description: Message shown when Ace Script fails fetching version data of the script.
msgErrorFetchingUpdateInfo.message: Tìm kiếm thông tin cập nhật thất bại.

msgErrorLoadingData.description: Message shown on confirm page when the script to be installed cannot be loaded.

msgErrorLoadingDependency.description: Message shown when not all requirements are loaded successfully.

msgImported.description: Message shown after import. There is an argument referring to the count of scripts imported.

msgInstalled.description: Message shown when a script is installed.

msgInvalidScript.description: Message shown when script is invalid.

msgLoadedData.description: Message shown in the confirm page when a javascript file to be installed is loaded.

msgLoading.description: Message shown in the options page before script list is loaded.

msgLoadingData.description: Message shown on confirm page when the script to be installed is loading.

msgLoadingDependency.description: Message shown on confirm page when the requirements are being downloaded.

msgNamespaceConflict.description: Message shown when namespace of the new script conflicts with an existent one.
msgNamespaceConflict.message: Xung đột namespace! Vui lòng sửa @name và @namespace.

msgNewVersion.description: Message shown when a new version of script is found by @updateURL, but no @downloadURL is provided.

msgNoUpdate.description: Message shown when there is no new version of a script.

msgSavedBlacklist.description: Message shown when blacklist are saved.
msgSavedBlacklist.message: Danh sách đen đã cập nhật.

msgSavedCustomCSS.description: Message shown when custom CSS is saved.
msgSavedCustomCSS.message: Giao diện tùy chỉnh đã cập nhật.

msgSavedScriptTemplate.description: Message shown when custom script template is saved.
msgSavedScriptTemplate.message: Script template tuỳ chỉnh đã được lưu

msgSyncInit.description: Message shown when sync service is initializing.

msgSyncInitError.description: Message shown when sync fails in initialization.

msgSyncReady.description: Message shown when sync will start soon.

msgSyncing.description: Message shown when sync is in progress.

msgUpdated.description: Message shown when a script is updated/reinstalled.

msgUpdating.description: Message shown when a new version of script is being fetched.

noValues.description: Label shown when there is no value for current script.
noValues.message: Không có giá trị nào được lưu trữ

notifDontShowAnymore.description: Label for the second notification button

notifShowMore.description: Label for the first notification button

optionShowEnabledFirst.description: Option to show enabled scripts first in alphabetical order.
optionShowEnabledFirst.message: Hiển thị script được bật trước

searchCaseSensitive.description: Option to perform a case-sensitive search

searchUseRegex.description: Option to perform a regular expression search

valueLabelKey.description: Label for key of a script value.

valueLabelValue.description: Label for value of a script value.
valueLabelValue.message: Giá trị (đã đưa về dạng JSON)

warnScriptLongLines.description: Warning message shown when script has lines that are too long to be edited.
warnScriptLongLines.message: Một số dòng quá dài, đang mở ở chế độ chỉ đọc. Vui lòng mở bằng trình chỉnh sửa bên ngoài.
